scriptLines:
query: 'select 
Brand_Skey as odBrand_Skey,
ID as odID,
BrandName as odBrandName,
Price as odPrice,
Eff_strt_date as odEff_strt_date,
Eff_End_date as odEff_End_date,IsActive as odIsActive  from OD.DIM_BRANDS',
split1@Update filter(ID == odID && (BrandName != odBrandName || Price != odPrice)) ~> filter1

query: 'select 
Brand_Skey as odBrand_Skey,
ID as odID,
BrandName as odBrandName,
Price as odPrice,
Eff_strt_date as odEff_strt_date,
Eff_End_date as odEff_End_date,IsActive as odIsActive  from OD.DIM_BRANDS',
query: 'SELECT isnull(MAX(TransactionKey),1000000000) AS TransactionKey from dbo.FACT_CARDS_TRANSACTIONS',
query: 'SELECT DISTINCT Currency AS Currency FROM dbo.STG_CARDS_TRANSACTIONS',

postSQLs:['MERGE INTO dbo.SNAPSHOT_MERCHENT AS T
USING (
(
SELECT 
     MerchantID,
     Currency,
     DATENAME(MONTH, TransactionDate) AS MonthName,
     count(CardNumber) as TrnCount,
    sum(AmountUSD) as TotalAmount,
     CASE WHEN AuthCOde is null or AuthCOde = 0 then 'REJECTED' else 'SUCCESS' end AS STATUS
From [dbo].[DW_CARDS_TRANSACTIONS]
group by MerchantID,
     Currency,DATENAME(MONTH, TransactionDate),CASE WHEN AuthCOde is null or AuthCOde = 0 then 'REJECTED' else 'SUCCESS' end)
) AS S
ON (T.MerchantID = S.MerchantID
AND T.Currency = S.Currency
AND T.MonthName =  S.MonthName
AND T.STATUS = S.STATUS)
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET T.TrnCount = S.TrnCount, T.TotalAmount = S.TotalAmount
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET THEN
    INSERT (MerchantID,Currency, MonthName, TrnCount, TotalAmount, STATUS) VALUES (S.MerchantID,S.Currency, S.MonthName, S.TrnCount, S.TotalAmount, S.STATUS)
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY SOURCE THEN
    DELETE;'],

query: 'SELECT 
    s.TransactionID,
    s.MerchantID,
    s.CardNumber,
    s.TransactionDate,
    s.AmountOG,
    s.AmountUSD,
    s.Currency,
    s.AuthCode,
    s.LoadDate
FROM OD.DW_CARDS_TRANSACTIONS s
LEFT JOIN OD.FACT_CARDS_TRANSACTIONS t 
    ON s.TransactionID = t.TransactionID
WHERE t.TransactionID IS NULL',

query: 'SELECT 
DISTINCT S.Currency,
T.CurrencyCode
FROM OD.STG_CARDS_TRANSACTIONS S
Left Join OD.DIM_CURRENCY T
ON S.Currency = T.CurrencyCode
where T.CurrencyCode is null',

postSQLs:['MERGE INTO OD.SNAPSHOT_MERCHENT AS T
USING (
(
SELECT 
     MerchantID,
     Currency,
     DATENAME(MONTH, TransactionDate) AS MonthName,
     count(CardNumber) as TrnCount,
    sum(AmountUSD) as TotalAmount,
     CASE WHEN AuthCOde is null or AuthCOde = 0 then 'REJECTED' else 'SUCCESS' end AS STATUS
From [OD].[DW_CARDS_TRANSACTIONS]
group by MerchantID,
     Currency,DATENAME(MONTH, TransactionDate),CASE WHEN AuthCOde is null or AuthCOde = 0 then 'REJECTED' else 'SUCCESS' end)
) AS S
ON (T.MerchantID = S.MerchantID
AND T.Currency = S.Currency
AND T.MonthName =  S.MonthName
AND T.STATUS = S.STATUS)
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET T.TrnCount = S.TrnCount, T.TotalAmount = S.TotalAmount
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET THEN
    INSERT (MerchantID,Currency, MonthName, TrnCount, TotalAmount, STATUS) VALUES (S.MerchantID,S.Currency, S.MonthName, S.TrnCount, S.TotalAmount, S.STATUS)
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY SOURCE THEN
    DELETE;'],

scripts.text: SELECT isnull(MAX(TransactionKey),1000000000) AS TransactionKey from OD.FACT_CARDS_TRANSACTIONS
